GeneralInfo.Name: Frames
GeneralInfo.Author: lbr_lion
GeneralInfo.ExtensionDescription:
Frames is a simple and light skin based on ideas of other skins and sources.
Frames is a grey coloured skin with details/icons in blue at a resolution of 1280x720. All screens are designed in such a way that all information will be diplayed within frames in a uniform way.
GeneralInfo.VersionDescription:
Initial release: This version is compatible with MediaPortal 1.2.0 Alpha only. (It will probably work with previous versions, but some information will not be displayed correctly).
In this first version all core plugins of MediaPortal are supported and only a limited amount of external plugins are supported for the moment:
- Moving Pictures - Fanart Handler (MyMusicPlayingNow and MyVideos) - InfoService - Online Videos - My Lyrics - Media Slayer - MP Extension Installer

SectionParam.Name: Force to uninstall on update
SectionParam.Description: Show dialog and force to uninstall previous version when updating an extension. Should only be disabled if you are using an NSIS/MSI installer.
